mapper.sql: id , ext_corp_id, ext_creator_id, ext_id, name, position, corp_name, avatar, type, gender, unionid, external_profile, created_at, updated_at, has_delete
mapper.select: select * from wx_customer where id = #{id} order by created_at desc

select c.id, c.ext_corp_id, m.ext_staff_id as ext_creator_id, c.ext_id, c.name, c.position, c.corp_name, c.avatar,c.type, c.gender, c.unionid, c.external_profile, m.create_time as created_at, c.updated_at, c.has_delete, m.is_deleted_staff from wx_customer c left join wx_customer_staff m on c.id = m.customer_id left join wx_customer_staff_assist a on m.ext_corp_id = a.ext_corp_id and m.ext_staff_id = a.ext_staff_id and m.ext_customer_id = a.ext_customer_id
m.has_delete is not null and c.has_delete is not null and c.has_friend = 1
and c.ext_corp_id =#{dto.extCorpId}
and c.name like concat('%',#{dto.name},'%')
and (m.ext_staff_id = #{dto.loginStaffExtId} or a.assist_ext_staff_id = #{dto.loginStaffExtId})
group by m.id order by IF(ISNULL(c.updated_at),1,0), m.create_time desc, m.id desc

select ext_id from wx_customer
has_friend = 1
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and has_delete is null
and has_delete is not null
select ext_id from wx_customer where ext_corp_id = #{extCorpId} and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%') and has_friend = 1

select count(DISTINCT c.id) from wx_customer c LEFT JOIN wx_customer_staff m ON c.ext_corp_id = m.ext_corp_id and c.ext_id = m.ext_customer_id where c.ext_corp_id = #{extCorpId} and c.has_delete IS NOT NULL and m.has_delete IS NOT NULL
